hero.name: Arnaud Elphège
hero.title: Senior SAP S/4HANA Project Manager | IT Consultant
hero.description: Expert in SAP S/4HANA integration, digital transformation, and change management

about.title: About me
about.content: specializing in SAP S/4HANA project management and digital transformation. Expert in integration project leadership, change management, and business process redesign. Technical leadership with international team coordination and significant budget management
about.closing: . Strong inter-team collaboration skills, mentoring, and change support capabilities.

sap.title: SAP S/4HANA & System Integration
sap.description: Comprehensive mastery of SAP S/4HANA integration projects with interface management across multiple tools (Salesforce, Kimble, SuccessFactors, Kyriba, Expensya, ADP, Streamline). Expert in Core Model Interface design and international coordination of complex projects.

leadership.title: Technical Leadership & Project Management
leadership.description: Proven experience in team leadership with end-to-end IT project management including schedule, workload, and budget oversight. Team mentoring capabilities, international coordination, and cross-team collaboration. PRINCE2 and PSPO certifications.

change.title: Change Management & Support
change.description: Change management specialist with expertise in communication plan development, training materials creation, and workshop facilitation. Customer satisfaction-oriented approach and continuous improvement focus.

experience.title: Professional experience
experience.subtitle: Over 5 years of experience in IT project management, digital transformation, and change management

talan.context: Talan is a consulting firm with over 6,000 consultants across 20 countries. Led the international SAP S/4HANA deployment for all group entities (France, UK, Canada, USA, Switzerland) aimed at improving accounting processes and invoice digitalization.
achievements: Managed planning, workload, and €1.5M annual budget with 15% cost reduction
Coordinated international Interface project (5 countries, 21 legal entities)
Deployed Core Model Interfaces between Salesforce, SuccessFactors, Kyriba, Expensya, and SAP
Supervised 8 developers with specs validation and quality monitoring
Implemented 15 SAP interfaces with 20% reduction in time-to-market

metpark.context: Metpark manages Bordeaux Métropole's parking network. Digitalization strategy redesign mission to optimize front-office and back-office customer journeys.
achievements: Strategic analysis with competitor benchmarking
Customer journey mapping via interviews and co-construction workshops
Definition of target customer journey and macro-functionalities
Value-oriented roadmap with prioritization of high business impact actions

sncf.context: SNCF Réseau manages France's national railway network with over 42 clients. Optimization of the Claims and Incident Service handling customer disputes and compensation.
achievements: Process optimization with 30% efficiency improvement
Drafted operating procedures for IT systems and business processes
Managed key account claims (disputes and compensation)
KPI monitoring and analysis for continuous improvement

urssaf_crpcen.context: Transfer of CRPCEN (Notary Clerks and Employees Pension Fund) contribution collection to Urssaf effective January 1, 2023. Major change management initiative to acculturate managers.
achievements: Comprehensive support plan for CRPCEN transfer to general scheme
Identification of partners and transfer facilitation actions
Training materials creation for Urssaf representatives and partners
Bi-monthly workshops for progress tracking and issue management
Complete documentation (specifications, operating procedures, FAQ)

urssaf_bonus.context: Unemployment insurance Bonus-Malus system aimed at combating abusive use of short-term contracts. Change management with representative training and dispute handling.
achievements: Designed e-learning following Urssaf agent needs assessment
Support plan and bi-monthly webinars for 150+ representatives
Qualitative and quantitative dispute monitoring (classification, responses, anomalies)
Complete documentation (Pora UI operating procedures, phone scripts)
25% reduction in processing times

defense_dirisi.context: Joint Directorate of Infrastructure Networks and Information Systems. Support for internal reorganization management with guidance for 300+ IT projects through milestone transitions.
achievements: Managed 300+ IT projects with structured reporting to directorates
Organized COMEP for milestone transitions (pre-production, production, operations)
Internal process redesign following ministerial instructions
Template formalization and distribution for COMEP
Project manager mentoring with individual follow-up

justice.context: Prison Administration Department. APPI IT system redesign aimed at monitoring and reintegrating persons under judicial supervision to improve system usage.
achievements: Requirements gathering through workshops with business users
Opportunity study drafting for strategic validation
Definition of optimized business processes and macro-functionalities
Change management for new IT system adoption

defense_dga.context: Comparative study between American and French DITB (Defense Industrial and Technological Base) to protect and strengthen national DITB with recommendations to DGA.
achievements: Mapping of French DITB protection mechanisms
Comparative analysis of American and French DITB with best practices identification
Interviews with defense industry stakeholders for issue collection
Strategic recommendations for DGA

interface.company: Interface Sciences Po Toulouse Junior Conseil
interface.context: Sciences Po Toulouse junior enterprise. Study monitoring process formalization to improve operations and mission quality with annual audit preparation.
achievements: Study monitoring process formalization for quality improvement
Drafted and reviewed all mission documents
Supported 15 consultants during missions
Prepared and organized annual audit
Business development and legal framework training

toulouse.context: Toulouse Métropole Climate Air and Territorial Energy Plan (PCAET) (2018-2023). PCAET monitoring and evaluation through indicator definition and dashboard construction.
achievements: PCAET monitoring dashboard development
Indicator definition with 20 project managers via collaborative workshops
Comparative study on citizen participation in PCAET evaluation
Strategic recommendations for monitoring improvement

degrees.degree: Master 2 Public Policy Consulting and Expertise
